### Steps to reproduce the issue

Hi! uriparser packaging is at version 0.9.3 while upstream is at version 0.9.5 which among other things includes [an important bugfix](https://github.com/uriparser/uriparser/blob/d96e1025e98cf99de7dbdea593160a2f6c078b6f/ChangeLog#L18-L21). It would be great to have packaging updated to the latest release to get that fix out to Spack users. Thank you! :pray:

n/a

title: Please upgrade packaging of uriparser from 0.9.3 to 0.9.5 to fix bugs
